title: Remembering Isiah Whitlock Jr: A Famous Actor from TV Shows
summary: Isiah Whitlock Jr was a famous actor who has died at 71 years old. He was known for playing roles in TV shows like The Wire and Veep. His manager shared the sad news on Instagram. Whitlock also acted in movies such as Goodfellas and worked with director Spike Lee many times. On The Wire, he played a politician and had a funny catchphrase that people loved. He said he got the idea from his uncle. On Veep, he played a funny defense secretary. He was from Indiana and acted in many other films and TV shows. He passed away in New York after being sick for a short time. People remember him as a great actor and a nice person.

background_read: Isiah Whitlock Jr was an actor from Indiana who became famous for his roles in TV and movies. He worked with famous people like Spike Lee and was known for his kind personality. His catchphrase from The Wire made him popular with fans. This article tells about his life and how people are remembering him after his death.

WHAT: He died at age 71 after a short illness
WHERE: He passed away in New York
WHY: To share news of his death and remember his acting career
